participant_1.background:
I can't eat ice cream, but I'll dress up in a costume to celebrate Halloween with my family.
I don't exercise often because I have a lot of other things going on in my life.
I now use my artistic talents to create games that promote animal welfare.
I spent my last birthday at the library with Nanette.
i am canadian.

participant_2.background:
I like to draw and paint because it helps me express myself.
I don't have any pets, because I'm too busy with my cosplay gear and working out to take care of them.
i stay active.
I wish I could share my love of nature with my girlfriend.
i like to play guitar.

content.text: I like to draw and paint too!
Cool! What kind of things do you like to draw and paint?
I like to draw and paint animals. I am passionate about animal welfare and I like to create games that promote animal welfare.
That's awesome! I'm not much of an artist, but I love animals too. I like to go hiking and camping in nature.
That's great! I love nature too. I wish I could share my love of nature with my girlfriend.
Maybe you could take her on a hike or camping trip?
That's a great idea! I'll have to suggest that to her.
Awesome! I hope she says yes!
Me too! Thanks for chatting with me!
No problem! It was nice talking to you too!
